metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7589 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.2 isaffected. Safari before 10.0.2 is affected. iCloud before 6.1 is affected.iTunes before 12.5.4 is affected. watchOS before 3.1.3 is affected. Theissue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
